title: HELP!!
body: ok i can log into game join a match get my champ but after that it while its loading to start match it kicks me out of game completely i know it may have something to do with avast but can someone give me a walk-thru on what to do im kinda slow when it comes to all this there is nothing in my virus chest and LoL exe thing in my files isnt there either so what do i do

replies.body: When exactly are you getting kicked out of game?  Are you seeing any error messages and what does it say?  Let me know!
